In today's world, online shopping is a common trend that is rapidly growing. Right from clothes to groceries, everything is now available online. However, the best deals and discounts are not always easy to find. This is where the software "FlipShope" comes into the picture. 

## What is FlipShope

FlipShope is a software extension that provides shopping deals, discounts, and price comparison of products from various e-commerce platforms like Amazon, Flipkart and other popular shopping websites. This extension is available in chrome and firefox extensions.

## How does FlipShope work

Once you have installed the FlipShope extension, it starts working in the background when you start browsing on any e-commerce website. When you click on a product, it automatically compares the prices of the same product available on other e-commerce sites like Amazon, Flipkart, and others to provide you with a wider range of choices. 

Another great feature of FlipShope is that it provides alerts when a product's price drops below a certain amount. This helps users save money when shopping online. 

## Why is FlipShope gaining popularity

FlipShope has become popular amongst online shoppers, as it saves time and money. With the help of this extension, shoppers can now easily find the best deals and discounts while browsing. Additionally, FlipShope offers Cashback and Reward Points for purchases made through their link. 

## Conclusion

In conclusion, FlipShope is a must-have tool for all online shoppers. It provides a one-stop solution for finding the best deals and discounts while shopping on popular e-commerce websites. It is easy to use and is available in various browsers. So, install FlipShope today and start saving money while shopping online.
